thread.title: Chris Eubank Junior wins IBO World super-middleweight title
thread.title_full: Chris Eubank Junior wins IBO World super-middleweight title

title: Chris Eubank Junior wins IBO World super-middleweight title
text:
5 February 2017 at 12:13am Chris Eubank Junior wins IBO World super-middleweight title Chris Eubank Jr is the new IBO World super-middleweight champion. Credit: Steven Paston / PA 
Chris Eubank Jr is the new IBO World super-middleweight champion after beating Australia's Renold Quinlan with a 10th round stoppage. 
Eubank, 27, claimed his 24th victory in 25 fights to win the title despite a dogged performance from his opponent who battled harder than many predicted. 
The fight was the first pay-per-view boxing event on ITV Box Office but some fans complained that they missed coverage of the earlier fights because of a blue screen. 
Eubank has now become a world champion more than 26 years after his father won the WBO middleweight title. Last updated Sun 5 Feb 2017
